content: Park in SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Pearl's Hill City Park" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(August 2010)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Pearl's Hill City Park** is a 9 hectares city park in Singapore built around a reservoir on top of [Pearl's Hill](/wiki/Pearl%27s_Hill). It is located behind [Outram Park MRT station](/wiki/Outram_Park_MRT_station). - [List of parks in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_parks_in_Singapore) - [National Parks Board](/wiki/National_Parks_Board) - National Parks Board, Singapore - National Parks Board, Singapore - Pearl's Hill City Park - National Parks Board, Singapore - Pearl's Hill City Park This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. title: Pearl's Hill City Park
